definition: fragrance/warm/to educate/variant of 熏[xun1]/to smoke/to fumigate
grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
to smoke/to fumigate/to assail the nostrils/to perfume
obsessed by a craving for power/power-hungry
to be eager for wealth and emolument (idiom)
(of greed, lust etc) to dominate one's thoughts
lit. fragrant herbs and foul herbs do not go into the same vessel (idiom)/bad people and good people do not mix

sentences.english: You'll never get the bacon grease off the plates if you don't use detergent.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不使用去垢劑你永遠不能除去薰豬肉的油脂。

sentences.english: For appetizer my wife will have smoked salmon, but I preferashrimp cocktail.
sentences.chinese: 我太太要薰鮭魚作開胃菜，但是我想要蝦子。

sentences.english: Take the heat out of them with plantain, which has both anti-inflammatory and antiallergenic properties.
sentences.chinese: 可用具有抗炎和抗過敏作用的車前草薰來消炎止癢。

sentences.english: Delicate smoked salmon provides a heart-healthy element to your table.
sentences.chinese: 精緻的薰三文魚爲您的餐桌增加有益心臟健康的元素。

sentences.english: Purveyor of smoked Canadian trout, Alaskan salmon and Lake Superior whitefish .
sentences.chinese: 接受者加拿大薰鱒魚，阿拉斯加鮭魚和湖優越的白魚。

sentences.english: He had smoked for so many years that his teeth were permanently stained yellow.
sentences.chinese: 他吸了那麼多年煙，牙齒都被永久地薰黃了。

sentences.english: Secondly, the process for producing liquid smoking Channel Catfish block was studied.
sentences.chinese: 其次對液薰斑點叉尾鯝加工工藝進行研究。

sentences.english: Fumigating wind brings us another spring, and also makes the ground green.
sentences.chinese: 薰風捎來又一個春天，也薰綠了大地。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical efficacy of "Fufang Daihuang Lotion" in the treatment of mixed hemorrhoids.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察複方大黃湯薰洗治療混合痔的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: A fireman collapsed from the fumes.
sentences.chinese: 一個救火員被濃煙薰倒了。

sentences.english: North Carolina smokes the whole hog in a vinegar-based sauce.
sentences.chinese: 北卡羅萊納薰整隻豬澆着含醋的醬汁。

sentences.english: I kept tame goats, and then kill and eat, and smoked and pickled.
sentences.chinese: 我飼養溫馴的山羊，然後殺了喫，又薰又醃的。

sentences.english: Hot water, fry eggplants root nozzle, fumigation chilblain.
sentences.chinese: 茄子根煎水，趁熱薰洗患處，可治凍瘡。

sentences.english: All right, I'll take it instead.
Borscht can be spiced up with roasted apples and smoked goose breast.
sentences.chinese: 羅宋湯可以用烘烤過的蘋果和薰鵝脯來提味。

sentences.english: The paper is then charred by a lamp or candle and the sewn pattern outline removed.
sentences.chinese: 拿到燈燭上用煙薰烤，烤黑，把剪紙圖形取下。

definition: Minister of War (official title in pre-Han Chinese states)/two-character surname Sima
